name: Techne Model File
summary: Learn about .TCN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: In the Techne program, TCN files can be exported to the "Texturemap", "Turbo Model Thingy", "AdventureCraft", and "Java" formats.

description: Model created by Techne, a Windows program used to design models used in Minecraft; contains data that describes the model, which includes dimensions, position, and texture; can be edited in Techne.
